channel.title: Prayer points not falling down *SOLVED*
channel.description:
When i activate some prayer, its activates, but prayer points not going down, how fix it?
Config.java [code=java5] public static final boolean PRAYER_POINTS_REQUIRED = true; // you need prayer points to use prayer[/code]

item.title: Prayer points not falling down *SOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @Deptas1599 Deptas1599
item.description:
@Deptas1599 wrote:

i got 3 files of combatassistant … ;/
in 1 of them is just this

[code=java5] /Prayer/

public void activatePrayer(int i) {
	if(c.duelRule[7]){
		for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			c.prayerActive[p] = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		c.sendMessage("Prayer has been disabled in this duel!");
		return;
	}
	if(c.inRFD()){
		for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			c.prayerActive[p] = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		c.sendMessage("You cannot use prayer in here!");
		return;
	}
	if (i == 24 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
		c.sendMessage("You need 60 Defence to use Chivarly");
		return;
	}
	if (i == 25 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
		c.sendMessage("You need 70 defence to use Piety");
		return;
	}
	if(c.altarPrayed == 1) {
		for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			c.prayerActive[p] = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		c.sendMessage("You are not on the right prayerbook!!");
		return;
	}
	

[/code]

in second

[code=java5] /Prayer/

public void activatePrayer(int i) {
	if(c.duelRule[7]){
		for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			c.prayerActive[p] = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		c.sendMessage("Prayer has been disabled in this duel!");
		return;
	}
	if(c.inRFD()){
		for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			c.prayerActive[p] = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		c.sendMessage("You cannot use prayer in here!");
		return;
	}
	if (i == 24 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
		c.sendMessage("You need 60 Defence to use Chivarly");
		return;
	}
	if (i == 25 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
		c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
		c.sendMessage("You need 70 defence to use Piety");
		return;
	}

[/code]

in third (CombatAssitant (2).java)

[code=java5] public void activatePrayer(int i) {
if(c.duelRule[7]){
for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows
c.prayerActive[p] = false;
c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);
}
c.sendMessage(“Prayer has been disabled in this duel!”);
return;
}
if(c.inRFD()){
for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows
c.prayerActive[p] = false;
c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);
}
c.sendMessage(“You cannot use prayer in here!”);
return;
}
if (i == 24 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
c.sendMessage(“You need 60 Defence to use Chivarly”);
return;
}
if (i == 25 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
c.sendMessage(“You need 70 defence to use Piety”);
return;
}

[/code]

item.description:

[code=java5] /End of curse prayers/

		/**Prayers**/
		case 97168: // thick skin

		break;	
		case 97170: // burst of str

		break;	
		case 97172: // charity of thought
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(2);
		break;	
		case 97174: // range

		break;
		case 97176: // mage

		break;
		case 97178: // rockskin

		break;

		break;
		case 97182:	// improved reflexes

		break;
		case 97184: //hawk eye

		break;
		case 97186:
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(9);
		break;
		case 97188: // protect Item
		/*if(c.trade11 > 1) {
		for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			c.prayerActive[p] = false;
			c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		c.sendMessage("You must wait 15 minutes before using this!");
		return;
		}*/
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(10);
		break;			
		case 97190: // 26 range
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(11);
		break;
		case 97192: // 27 mage
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(12);
		break;	
		case 97194: // steel skin
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(13);
		break;
		case 97196: // ultimate str

		break;
		case 97198: // incredible reflex
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(15);
		break;	
		case 97200: // protect from magic
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(16);
		break;					
		case 97202: // protect from range
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(17);
		break;
		case 97204: // protect from melee
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(18);
		break;
		case 97206: // 44 range

		break;

		break;

		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(24);
		break;
		case 97218: // piety
		c.getCombat().activatePrayer(25);
		break;

item.title: Prayer points not falling down *SOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @Deptas1599 Deptas1599
item.description:
@Deptas1599 wrote:

founded this in cmbassst.jv

public int calculateMeleeDefence() { int defenceLevel = c.playerLevel[1]; int i = c.playerBonus[bestMeleeDef()]; if (c.prayerActive[0]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.05; } else if (c.prayerActive[5]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.1; } else if (c.prayerActive[13]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.15; } else if (c.prayerActive[24]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.2; } else if (c.prayerActive[25]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.25; } return (int)(defenceLevel + (defenceLevel * 0.15) + (i + i * 0.05)); }

public int calculateRangeDefence() { int defenceLevel = c.playerLevel[1]; if (c.prayerActive[0]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.05; } else if (c.prayerActive[5]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.1; } else if (c.prayerActive[13]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.15; } else if (c.prayerActive[24]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.2; } else if (c.prayerActive[25]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.25; } else if (c.curseActive[19]) { // turmoil defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.15 + c.getdef; } return (int) (defenceLevel + c.playerBonus[9] + (c.playerBonus[9] / 2)); }

public int mageDef() { int defenceLevel = c.playerLevel[1]/2 + c.playerLevel[6]/2; if (c.prayerActive[0]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.05; } else if (c.prayerActive[3]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.1; } else if (c.prayerActive[9]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.15; } else if (c.prayerActive[18]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.2; } else if (c.prayerActive[19]) { defenceLevel += c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.playerDefence]) * 0.25; } return (int) (defenceLevel + c.playerBonus[8] + (c.playerBonus[8] / 3)); }

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer points not falling down *SOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That means the boolean probably isn’t being used…

If I remember correctly, PI handles the prayer draining in one of those 2 classes. But I’m leaning towards Client…

I’d look for a variable named “prayerActive” or something along those lines.

It should be an array of booleans, so it’d look like “prayerActive[0]” or w/e.

Find where that is being checked (NOT SET) and post the code.

Read full topic
